sen.j: 松久 朋琳（まつひさ ほうりん、1901年（明治34年） - 1987年（昭和62年）9月1日）は、仏師。
sen.e: Horin MATSUHISA (1901 - September 1, 1987) was a busshi (sculptor of Buddhist statues).
Horin MATSUHISA (1901 - September 1, 1987) was a busshi (sculptor of Buddhist statues).
Horin MATSUHISA (1901 - September 1, 1987) was a busshi (sculptor of Buddhist statues).
He was born in Kyoto Prefecture.
He was born in Kyoto Prefecture.
He was born in Kyoto Prefecture.

tit.cmt: 大文字に修正しました。

sen.j: 10歳より仏像彫刻をはじめ、およそ70年余りの間仏像を彫り続けた。
sen.e: He started to sculpture Buddhist statues at the age of ten and continued to sculpture Buddhist statues for more than 70 years.
He started to sculpt Buddhist statues at the age of 10 and continued for more than 70 years.
sen.cmt: sculpture→sculpt,ten→10,to sculpture Buddhist statues を削除しました。
sen.e: He started to sculpt Buddhist statues at the age of 10 and continued for more than 70 years.

tit.cmt: 大文字に修正しました。

sen.j: 木のこころ仏のこころ（西岡常一と共著）
sen.e: "Ki no Kokoro, Hotoke no Kokoro" (the heart of Wood, the heart of Buddha) (cowritten with Tsunekazu NISHIOKA)
Ki no Kokoro, Hotoke no Kokoro (The heart of Wood, the heart of Buddha) (co-written with Tsunekazu NISHIOKA)
sen.cmt: クォーツを削除しました。the→The,cowritten→co-written と修正しました。
sen.e: Ki no Kokoro, Hotoke no Kokoro (The heart of Wood, the heart of Buddha) (co-written with Tsunekazu NISHIOKA)

sen.j: 仏像彫刻のすすめ（正・続）
sen.e: "Butsuzo-chokoku no susume" (Introduction of Buddhist Sculpture) (volume 1 and 2).
Butsuzo-chokoku no susume (Introduction of Buddhist Sculpture) (volume 1 and 2)
sen.cmt: クォーツを削除しました。ピリオドを削除しました。
sen.e: Butsuzo-chokoku no susume (Introduction of Buddhist Sculpture) (volume 1 and 2)
